Summary: I was taking pictures of isle of man on journey to Northern ireland when i took about 4 pictures of the isle of man. in these pictures there is a time window of about 5 mins but the object was there and gone within a 23 second window, seen in photos
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife, daughter and myself where taking a ferry from Liverpool to Belfast. As it was there first time going to Belfast i decided to take photos of the 8 hour journey for our family album. As we passed the Isle of Man, i took about 7-8 photos of my wife and daughter as we passed the Isle, and some of the actual Isle of Man itself. It wasnt until i got back from Belfast and uploaded my photos to my Ps3, that i noticed that something was in the middle of the screen on one of the photos. I checked the other photos to see if there was a mark on my phone camera, but tere was nothing. I also checked the other photos to see if the same mark appeared in them, but nothing was there. I dont know what i is or where it went to as there is about a 25 second gap between it being there and then nothing.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Isle Of Man
This sighting has never been favorited.
